Content: The GCE Ordinary Level Examination will commence tomorrow. 656,641 candidates are sitting for the examination this year.422,850 school candidates have applied for the exam. The number of private candidates applied for the exam is 233,798. The GCE O/L examination will be conducted at 4,681 centres. The Department of Examinations has requested the candidates to come early at the examination centres. The exam will be held until the 12th of this month. The Examinations Department has banned lectures, conferences, workshops and distribution of model papers until the end of the exam. The Department said that keeping in possessions posters, banners, leaflets and publishing of related material over electronic and print media are also banned.
